meanings.sent1: Monogamists believe in being faithful to one partner.
meanings.sent2: Monogamists prefer to have only one romantic relationship at a time.
meanings.sent3: The monogamists at the party joked about how hard it is to stay loyal.
meanings.sent4: In a world of options, monogamists are like rare gems, treasured for their commitment.
meanings.sent5: The image of monogamists as loyal and devoted partners is deeply ingrained in society.

meanings.definition: Those who are committed to a single partner in a romantic or sexual relationship.
meanings.sent1: Many monogamists choose to be with only one person for life.
meanings.sent2: Monogamists value the bond they share with their significant other.
meanings.sent3: The group of monogamists giggled as they shared stories of their partners' quirks.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of flings, monogamists stand out like beacons of loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The commitment of monogamists shines brightly in a world of fleeting connections.
